Cerita Anak Kala Lihat Demi Moore Overdosis
05 Nov 2019, 01:11 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Anak-anak Demi Moore menuturkan pengalaman menjadi saksi saat sang ibu kecanduan alkohol dan narkoba. (dok. Rich Fury/Getty Images/AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Putri aktris senior Demi Moore dan Bruce Willis, Talullah Willis, membuka cerita tentang perilaku sang ibu saat mabuk. Talullah menyebut Demi bersikap bak 'monster'. "Itu seperti saat matahari terbenam dan, seorang monster keluar," kata Talullah untuk menggambarkan perubahan watak ibunya. Ia duduk bersama Jada Pinkett Smith dalam program Red Table Talk dan berkata, "Saya ingat hanya ada kecemasan yang muncul di tubuh ketika saya bisa merasakan matanya sedikit lebih tertutup, cara dia berbicara [berbeda].""Dia [Demi Moore] akan jauh lebih penuh kasih sayang kepada saya jika tidak mabuk," kata Talullah lagi. Demi Moore dikabarkan sempat mengalami kecanduan alkohol dan narkoba. Ia kemudian berhenti dan menjalani hidup sehat selama hampir 20 tahun. Namun perpisahan dengan Ashton Kutcher memicu kesedihan berlarut dan Demi kembali ke kebiasaan buruk itu. Anak pertama Demi, Rumer Willis, yang juga hadir dalam acara tersebut mengingat kembali pengalaman saat ia melihat sang ibu overdosis narkoba di depannya. "Saya ada di sana, di ruangan lain menelepon 911, panik. Antara ibu akan meninggal dan saya tidak akan berada di ruangan dan bakal merasa bersalah selama sisa hidup, atau saya berada di sana dan melihat gambaran ibu yang tidak akan pernah hilang dari kepala," ujar Rumer.


Demi Moore saat masih bersama Bruce Willis. Bersama, keduanya memiliki tiga orang anak. (dok. AFP PHOTO / KIM KULISH)

"Apa yang harus saya lakukan? Apa saya harus menelepon adik-adik di pagi hari dan memberi tahu mereka bahwa ibu meninggal dan mereka tidak akan pernah bisa berbicara dengannya lagi?" ujar Rumer.Ia melanjutkan, "Ia [Demi] jadi menggelegar [saat mabuk]," dan Talullah menambahkan, "Itu sangat aneh. Ada momen ketika ia jadi marah. Saya ingat jadi sangat kesal dan memperlakukannya seperti anak kecil, berbicara padanya seperti anak kecil. Tidak seperti ibu yang kami kenal saat bertumbuh besar."Kejadian tersebut menjadi titik balik untuk Demi, di mana ketiga anaknya kemudian memutuskan hubungan dengan Demi selama tiga tahun sebelum akhirnya berbaikan kembali. Demi Moore baru saja merilis memoar yang diberi judul 'Inside Out'. Memoar tersebut menjadi salah satu buku paling laku di The New York Times. Di tengah kesibukan promo memoar itu, Demi bercerita sang mantan suami, Bruce Willis meneleponnya hanya untuk menyampaikan bahwa ia bangga pada Demi. Mengaku bukan orang yang emosional, hal itu mampu membuat aktris film hit 'Ghost' tersebut meneteskan air mata. (kir/rea)

Children's Stories When Seeing Demi Moore Overdose
05 Nov 2019, 01:11 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Demi Moore's children say the experience of being a witness when the mother was addicted to alcohol and drugs. (doc. Rich Fury / Getty Images / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Daughter of senior actresses Demi Moore and Bruce Willis, Talullah Willis, opens the story of the mother's behavior when drunk. Talullah called Demi to act like a 'monster'. "It was like sunset and, a monster came out," Talullah said to illustrate the change in character of his mother. He sat down with Jada Pinkett Smith in the Red Table Talk program and said, "I remember there was only anxiety that arises in the body when I could feel his eyes a little more closed, the way he spoke [different]." "He [Demi Moore] would be far more full of compassion for me if I'm not drunk, "Talullah said again. Demi Moore reportedly had experienced alcohol and drug addiction. He then stopped and led a healthy life for almost 20 years. But parting with Ashton Kutcher sparked prolonged sadness and Demi returned to the bad habit. Demi's first child, Rumer Willis, who was also present at the event recalled the experience when he saw her mother overdosing on drugs in front of her. "I was there, in another room calling 911, panicking. Between the mother will die and I will not be in the room and will feel guilty for the rest of my life, or I will be there and see a picture of mother that will never disappear from the head, "said Rumer.


Demi Moore while still with Bruce Willis. Together, both of them have three children. (doc. AFP PHOTO / KIM KULISH)

"What should I do? Do I have to call the sisters in the morning and tell them that the mother is dead and they will never be able to talk to her again?" Rumer said. He continued, "He [Demi] thundered [while drunk]," and Talullah added, "That was very strange. There were moments when he became angry. I remember being very upset and treating him like a child, talking to him like a child Not like the mother we knew when growing up. "The incident was a turning point for Demi, where her three children then severed ties with Demi for three years before finally reconciling. Demi Moore has just released a memoir entitled 'Inside Out'. The memoir became one of the best-selling books in The New York Times. In the midst of the busy promo memoir, Demi told his ex-husband, Bruce Willis called him just to say that he was proud of Demi. Claiming not to be an emotional person, it was able to make the hit movie actress 'Ghost' shed tears. (kir / rea)
